reference.title: Resolve keyref (keyref)
reference.shortdesc: The keyref step examines all keys defined in the source material, and updates key references appropriately. Links that make use of keys are updated so that any href value is replaced by the appropriate target; key based text replacement is also evaluated. The keyref mechanism was defined as part of the DITA 1.2 standard, and is available in DITA-OT 1.5 and later.

section.p: This step is implemented in Java.
